wikipedia_page.main: Reginald Frederick Harrison (22 May 1923 – 17 September 2020) was an English professional footballer who played as a right winger.

response: The last surviving player from the game, Derby's Reg Harrison, died on 17 September 2020.

response: *17 September – Reg Harrison, 97, English footballer (Derby County, Boston United) and manager (Long Eaton United).
